review: 10 years after launch they release an update which REMOVES features. Plus, my 180 hours of game time got reset.
Gensec Lady - 'Wheres Barney, Can I speak to him?Bain - Looks at dead BarneyBain - 'Hes not available right now'Gensec Lady - 'Alright see you later'10/10 would kill Barney agian.
Best sequal to minecraft since call of duty.
